channel.title: Emulation on charliehart.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Emulation on charliehart.dev

item.title: Creating a Gameboy Emulator - Part 1
item.description: My first emulator project is to write a Gameboy emulator, in C++, and is a large project with several stages, so more posts will be made as new sections are added. At the time of writing, I have implemented the Gameboy’s CPU, memory bus and instruction set. Update 01/10/2024: Part 2 of this project can be found here. Github Repository GitHub - CharlieHart0/GameBoyEmu: A GameBoy emulator (The project is ongoing, and cannot yet be used as a full emulator)
